dict.string: Insig8 needs access to your calendar to show upcoming events.
Insig8 needs full access to your calendar to display and manage your events and reminders.
Insig8 needs calendar access to create events and reminders.
Insig8 needs access to your contacts for search functionality.
Insig8 needs access to your reminders to show and manage tasks.
Insig8 needs to control other applications to perform system actions.
Insig8 needs administrator privileges for some system actions.
Insig8 uses speech recognition to transcribe meeting audio and voice commands for AI-powered assistance. On macOS 26, uses native SpeechAnalyzer for enhanced accuracy and speaker diarization.

Insig8 needs microphone access to capture and transcribe audio for meeting intelligence and voice commands. Supports dual audio capture (microphone + system audio) for comprehensive meeting transcription.
Insig8 captures screen content and system audio to provide AI-powered insights and comprehensive meeting transcription. Required for ScreenCaptureKit dual audio capture on macOS 26.
Insig8 uses Apple's Foundation Models for on-device AI processing of meeting transcripts, generating summaries, action items, and insights while keeping all data private on your device.
